医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示非法芬太尼缉获量急剧增加一项新的分析显示，2017 年至 2023 年间，美国执法部门缉获的非法芬太尼数量增长了 1,700% 以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Study-reveals-sharp-surge-in-illicit-fentanyl-seizures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Study-reveals-sharp-surge-in-illicit-fentanyl-seizures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5427f383-a3d5-4fb6-a318-459e834d9fec Mon, 13 May 2024 14:04:09 -0400 Study reveals sharp surge in illicit fentanyl seizures
具有里程碑意义的研究为 2 型糖尿病的异质性提供了新的线索DZD 发表在《柳叶刀糖尿病与内分泌学》上的一项具有里程碑意义的研究为 2 型糖尿病的异质性提供了新的线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Landmark-study-sheds-new-light-on-the-heterogeneity-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Landmark-study-sheds-new-light-on-the-heterogeneity-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9438b8b1-164e-42da-ad69-8113b9403f20 Mon, 13 May 2024 13:12:11 -0400 Landmark study sheds new light on the heterogeneity of type 2 diabetes
索马鲁肽可改善心力衰竭症状并减少袢利尿剂量根据今天在 Heart 上发表的最新研究，索马鲁肽可减少袢利尿剂的使用和剂量，并对射血分数保留 (HFpEF) 心力衰竭患者的症状、身体限制和体重产生积极影响，无论是否使用利尿剂失败2024，欧洲心脏病学会的科学大会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Semaglutide-improves-heart-failure-symptoms-and-reduces-loop-diuretic-dose.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Semaglutide-improves-heart-failure-symptoms-and-reduces-loop-diuretic-dose.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5d7dd43-87b8-4012-8023-150fc5f38484 Mon, 13 May 2024 13:02:00 -0400 Semaglutide improves heart failure symptoms and reduces loop diuretic dose
SHINE 试验揭示溶栓后中风护理中的高血糖风险由 UVA Health 医学博士 Karen Johnston 领导的一项雄心勃勃的全国性临床试验为医生提供了他们长期以来急需的见解，了解中风患者在接受溶栓治疗后控制血糖的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/SHINE-trial-reveals-risks-of-high-blood-sugar-in-post-thrombothesis-中风-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/SHINE-trial-reveals-risks-of-high-blood-sugar-in-post-thrombothesis-中风-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec44c3e4-7d5b-44dc-a1e5-04dc1dbf4b72 Mon, 13 May 2024 12:59:19 -0400 SHINE trial reveals risks of high blood sugar in post-thrombolysis stroke care
麻疹疫苗对剖腹产儿童更有可能完全无效英国剑桥大学和中国复旦大学的一项研究发现，与自然出生的婴儿相比，单剂麻疹疫苗对剖腹产婴儿完全无效的可能性高出 2.6 倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Measles-vaccine-more-likely-to-be-completely-inefficient-in-children-born-by-C-section.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Measles-vaccine-more-likely-to-be-completely-inefficient-in-children-born-by-C-section.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=316425ea-ce96-4453-9376-98aaf905967e Mon, 13 May 2024 12:54:25 -0400 Measles vaccine more likely to be completely ineffective in children born by C-section
研究表明普通局部麻醉药的效果有限布比卡因脂质体十二年前上市，用于提供持久的局部疼痛控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Study-shows-limited-effectness-of-common-local-anesthetic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Study-shows-limited-effectness-of-common-local-anesthetic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e199789b-1ce3-4bc9-901b-ab6b5a951349 Mon, 13 May 2024 12:45:00 -0400 Study shows limited effectiveness of common local anesthetic
揭示根深蒂固的学校做法对儿童造成的心理伤害心理学家警告说，许多“根深蒂固于学校文化”的项目对儿童有害，并可能造成潜在的持久损害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Uncovering-the-psychological-toll-of-entrenched-school-practices-on-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Uncovering-the-psychological-toll-of-entrenched-school-practices-on-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc03ffc7-cf19-4f6c-bdf5-c885ceff078d Mon, 13 May 2024 08:55:37 -0400 Uncovering the psychological toll of entrenched school practices on children
研究揭示了加拿大最新的癌症趋势根据 CMAJ 的最新癌症趋势研究，由于人口增长和老龄化，加拿大的癌症病例和死亡人数预计将增加，但癌症诊断和死亡的总体比率将继续下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Study-reveals-latest-cancer-trends-in-Canada.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Study-reveals-latest-cancer-trends-in-Canada.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e17​​190b5-e25d-402b-9285-7a549314df3d Mon, 13 May 2024 08:41:00 -0400 Study reveals latest cancer trends in Canada
FDA 表示从未检查过制造有争议 AGGA 设备的牙科实验室十多年来，FDA 从未对约翰牙科实验室进行过检查，该实验室生产前牙生长引导器具（AGGA），这是一种据称伤害患者的牙科设备，目前已成为刑事调查的对象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/FDA-said-it-never-inspected-dental-lab-that-made-controversial-AGGA-device.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/FDA-said-it-never-inspected-dental-lab-that-made-controversial-AGGA-device.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f1461ab-1ffc-4e86-b9a8-9be1d974bf2d Mon, 13 May 2024 08:36:01 -0400 FDA said it never inspected dental lab that made controversial AGGA device
对白桦茸对抗口腔癌机制的新见解白桦茸提取物对 HSC-4 人类口腔癌细胞的抗肿瘤活性机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/New-insights-into-Chaga-mushrooms-mechanisms-for-fighting-oral-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/New-insights-into-Chaga-mushrooms-mechanisms-for-fighting-oral-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b939bad-199f-45a9-99fe-a9263a916a74 Mon, 13 May 2024 08:35:00 -0400 New insights into Chaga mushroom's mechanisms for fighting oral cancer
